story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_0100_10:
(Everyone else has gotten stronger since coming
to Pasio...)
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_0600_10: You’re Volo, right? Can I help you?
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_0800_10:
Yet it seems you have been unable to unleash
her full potential...
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_0900_10:
It was my understanding that Champions were
supposed to be very skilled, but perhaps that
assumption was wrong.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_1000_10: Well, that’s rather blunt of you.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_1300_10:
I only mean to express my support. You see,
I want the Pokémon wielders of this land to
become stronger.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_1400_10:
My aim is for as many individuals as possible to
use the sync stones ultimate.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_1500_10:
And in so doing, they can be deemed worthy by
a deity.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_1600_10: I’m sure you would also like to meet Arceus, no?
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_1800_10: Researching Arceus is no small feat—
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_1900_10: Like you, I have an interest in Pokémon mythology.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2100_10:
As you are now, you and your Pokémon will be
unable to draw a sync stone ultimate’s true
power.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2200_10: And your reasoning for that is?
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2400_10:
In this place, Pokémon battles are treated as
friendly competition.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2500_10:
You could never hope to win against people and
Pokémon who have battled through harsh
environments with their lives at stake.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2600_10:
As a Pokémon wielder, I give my own Pokémon
orders so that we can survive.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2700_10:
Pokémon honed through life-or-death situations
can better serve as swords and shields for people!
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2800_10:
You can only truly say you have a bond with
your Pokémon when you have reached that level.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_2900_10:
You make it sound like you view your Pokémon as
tools.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_3000_10:
Do you actually think Arceus will choose you, when
you treat your Pokémon so coldly?
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_3200_10: Would you care to try me?
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_3300_10:
Let’s determine whose way of forming a bond is
better, then, shall we?
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_3400_10: It’s OK, Lucario. Rest up a bit.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_3500_10: All right, then. I accept your challenge.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_3600_10:
The way you forge bonds with your Pokémon is
wrong—and I’ll prove it to you!
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_4000_10: (I’ve never seen anything like it before!)
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_4300_10:
I may have the chance to battle against you at
the tournament.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_4400_10:
It wouldn’t be very wise to show all my cards
now, would it?
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_4500_10: True. And I understand much better now...
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_4600_10:
You’re more than just talk, and I’m still not
skilled enough.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_4800_10:
I’ll never agree with you that there’s something
wrong with the bonds between me and my
Pokémon.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_5000_10: You still have my unwavering support.
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_5200_10:
(Surprisingly, she adapted quickly to my tactics
and responded with countermeasures of her own.)
story_stone_08_02000/2401_1201_5400_10: I know, Garchomp. It’s frustrating, isn’t it?
